"I'm always feeling flat and fake, like I'm just going through the motions of life without any real emotions. I struggle to control my happiness and often feel disconnected from the people around me. This post attributes the cause of the event (feeling flat and fake emotions, struggling with controlling happiness, missing empathy, and having difficulty feeling affection towards anyone) to a stable attributional style, suggesting that the person's inherent nature is the root of these issues.
